get.summary: List of entities in an explicit version of a single code system

parameters.name: codelist
parameters.description: Filter to results whose code exactly matches one of the codes in this list

parameters.name: codeSystem
parameters.description: Identifying code of the codesystem

parameters.name: codesystemversion
parameters.description: Version of the codesystem. Defaults to the newest version

parameters.name: matchvalue
parameters.description: Filter to results that contain this value, either in code or description

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to return. Starts with 1

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Size of a single page

get.summary: Returns details about a single entity

parameters.name: codeSystem
parameters.description: Identifying code of the codesystem

parameters.name: codesystemversion
parameters.description: Version of the codesystem. Defaults to the newest version

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: code of the parent entity

parameters.name: codelist
parameters.description: Filter to results whose code exactly matches one of the codes in this list

parameters.description: Identifying code of the codesystem

parameters.name: codesystemversion
parameters.description: Version of the codesystem. Defaults to the newest version

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: code of the parent entity

parameters.name: matchvalue

parameters.name: page

parameters.name: pagesize

post.summary: Resolves a list of entity codes with associated types into a list of actual entity codes
post.description:
Resolves a list of entity codes with associated types into a list of actual entity codes

Each entity code in the input has an associated type. Depending on the type, the code will resolve to the following:

  • fixed - itself
  • tree - itself and all its children

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: list of entities to be resolved

get.summary: Validates a list of entity codes in a given code system

parameters.name: codeSystem
parameters.description: Identifying code of the codesystem

parameters.name: codesystemversion
parameters.description: Version of the codesystem. Defaults to the newest version

parameters.name: entities
parameters.description: Codes of the entities to validate

get.summary: Lists code systems matching a criteria
get.description: Only the newest version of each code system will be returned

parameters.name: codelist
parameters.description: Filter to results whose code exactly matches one of the codes in this list

parameters.name: matchvalue
parameters.description: Filter to results that contain this value, either in code or description

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to return. Starts with 1

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Size of a single page
